resources.string: The banana is a herbaceous plant belonging to the Musaceae family, and usually holds between 3 or 4 meters high . Its stem is surrounded by sheaths of leaves and fruit resulting from it, which is a berry that is unique to grow in clusters, it is widely appreciated and consumed worldwide as food. Popularly it is known as banana

Wheat (Triticum spp) is the term for the whole grain, both cultivated and wild, belonging to the genus Triticum; They are annual plants in the grass family, widely cultivated throughout the wheat mundo.La word designates both the plant and its edible seeds, as happens with the names of other cereals.
Wheat (yellow) is one of the three most widely produced grain globally, with corn and rice, and the most widely consumed by humans in Western civilization since ancient times. The grain of wheat is used to make flour, whole wheat flour, semolina, beer (see also: History of beer) and a variety of food products.
The word \'wheat\' Triticum comes from the Latin word, meaning \'broken\', \'ground\' or \'beaten\', referring to the activity to be done to separate the wheat grain husk that covers it. Triticum means, therefore, the grain threshing necessary to be consumed; such as millet milium derived from Latin, meaning \'ground, milled\', that is, the grain it is necessary to grind to be consumed. Wheat (Triticum) is, therefore, one of the most ancient words for cereals (those relating to grinding or milling).

Lemon , lemon is a small evergreen fruit tree that can reach more than 4 m high. Its fruit is lemon (Arabic: ليمون , Laimun , Persian Laimu or laimún1 ) an edible fruit acid and extremely fragrant flavor that is used in food. The lemon tree has a smooth bark and wood prized for cabinet work hard and yellowish wood . Botanically , it is a hybrid species between C. medica (citron or french lemon) and C. aurantium (bitter orange ) .2 While others believe it is the result of various backcrosses between Citrus medica and key lime .

The orange is a citrus fruit edible obtained from sweet orange (Citrus sinensis × ) of bitter orange ( bitter orange ) and orange trees of other species or hybrids, Asiatic hybrids originating in ancient India , Vietnam or Southeast is China.1 fleshy more or less thick and hesperidium hardened shell , and the pulp is typically formed of eleven segments filled with juice or grape skins , which contains a lot of vitamin C , flavonoids and essential oils.
It is smaller and sweeter than grapefruit or grapefruit and larger, but less fragrant , the tangerine. There are numerous varieties of oranges , with the most hybrids produced from the species Citrus maxima , Citrus reticulata ( tangerine ) and Citrus medica ( citron) .

Solanum lycopersicum , commonly known as tomato , tomato or tomato . It\'s kind of the family Solanaceae native of America ( Peru and Mexico ) and cultivated worldwide for both fresh consumption and processed in different ways (salsa , mashed , juice , dried, canned) .

Lactuca sativa , lettuce , is a herbaceous plant of own regions semitempladas grown for food . Because of the many varieties that exist and their growing greenhouse cultivation can be consumed throughout the year . It is usually eaten raw , as an ingredient in salads and other dishes, but some varieties , particularly those of Chinese origin, have a more robust texture and so are used cooked .

Daucus carota subsp sativus , popularly called carrot is a vegetable that belongs to the family of Umbelliferae , also called Apiaceae , and considered the most important and most consumed species within this family . It is the domesticated form of wild , native carrot Europe and Southwest Asia . It is grown for its much larger , tasty and less fibrous texture root, but still the same species.
Cucumis sativus , known popularly as cucumbers, is an annual herb of the family Cucurbitaceae .
Application developed by Aida Albuerne Vega for the subject of Mobile Computing , Course 2014-2015 . \ N \ n Source : https://github.com/aidaav92/StockAlmacen

Grapefruit , also known as grapefruit or grapefruit , is the namesake fruit tree belonging to the genus Citrus of the family Rutaceae . This family includes more than 1,600 species. The genus Citrus is the most important family and consists of about 20 species all edible fruit abundant in vitamin C , flavonoids and essential oils. The fruits, called Espérides , are unique in that the pulp is formed by numerous vesicles full of juice.

Oatmeal is a genus of plants of the family of grasses , used as food and fodder. While oats early times had not the importance of wheat or barley , in Central Asia it was grown in large amount , but was considered a weed for those . In archaeological research tests the use of oats in Central Europe in the Bronze Age were found. Were also found that cereal grains in Egyptian excavations, although it could not prove it was cultivated.
